project_metadata.name: Gaziantep Kuzu Lahmacun
project_metadata.description: Authentic Turkish lahmacun and pide restaurant in Üsküdar, Istanbul.
project_metadata.target_audience: Locals in Üsküdar, tourists seeking authentic food, late-night eaters.
project_metadata.emotional_tone: Warm, Authentic, Traditional, Premium yet Accessible, Appetite-inducing.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain or parchment texture overlay on background sections (opacity 0.05).

assets.icons: Use lucide-react for all UI icons (Phone, MapPin, Clock, Instagram, ChevronDown, Star, etc.)

hero.style: Full screen with parallax background image (hero_bg).

content.headline: Authentic Taste of Gaziantep in Üsküdar
content.subheadline: Wood-fired Lahmacun & Pide crafted with heritage recipes.

menu_section.card_style: Minimalist card with image on top, title, description, and price. Hover effect: slight lift and shadow.

about_section.content: Story of the chef/owner, emphasis on 'Kuzu' (Lamb) quality and wood fire tradition.

reviews_section.card_style: Quote icon, review text, customer name, 5 stars (Gold color).

components.customization_rules: Override default radius to 'rounded-lg'. Use 'Playfair Display' for all CardTitles. Use 'Inter' for CardDescription.

rules: Fade in elements on scroll (viewport enter).

meta_tags.title: Gaziantep Kuzu Lahmacun | Authentic Turkish Cuisine in Üsküdar
meta_tags.description: Experience the best wood-fired Lahmacun and Pide in Istanbul. Authentic Gaziantep recipes, fresh ingredients, and warm hospitality in Üsküdar.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react` (or yarn add).
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors defined in `design_system`.
3. Add the Google Fonts import for 'Playfair Display' and 'Inter' in `index.css`.
4. Create a `Layout` component that wraps the page and handles the sticky header and footer.
5. Build the `Hero` section using the parallax effect.
6. Implement the `Menu` using Shadcn Tabs. Mock data for menu items.
7. Build the `Reviews` section using Shadcn Carousel.
8. Add the `FloatingActions` component fixed to the bottom right.

9. Ensure all text is in Turkish (use translation tools or placeholders if needed, but headers should be Turkish/English hybrid or clear). *Correction: Problem statement says Turkish language content. Use Turkish placeholders.*
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Ensure high contrast for text readability (WCAG AA).
Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text.
Mobile responsiveness is priority #1. Test grid collapses.
Use `sonner` for any toast notifications (e.g., 'Table Booked').
